predicate.note: Frames file for 'cramp' based on sentences in ectb2. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'hamper.'

role.descr: cramped with what, instrument if separate from arg 0

example.name: All Arguments, Idiomatic
example.text: In public, he cramped my style with his incessant impersonations of Simpson's characters.
example.arg: with his incessant impersonations of Simpson's characters

example.name: Pain
example.text: The runner's calf muscle cramped painfully after the race.
